chunk:
Beyond Miracles Cellstory Toner Plus

Brand: Beyond

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Beta-Glucan, Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Allantoin, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Adenosine, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, P

Oleracea Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Morus Alba Fruit Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Nut Extract, Glycine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Serine, Glutamic Acid, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Brassica Oleracea Capitata (Cabbage) Leaf Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ

Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Aspartic Acid, Leucine, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Extract, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Alanine, Lysine, Arginine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Threonine, Proline, Valine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Sodium Phosphate, Tryptophan, Asparagine, Cysteine, Glutamine, Methionine,

utamine, Methionine, sh-Oligopeptide-1, sh-Oligopeptide-2, sh-Polypeptide-1

Directions: After cleansing, apply to the palm of your hand and pat into the skin. One packet is meant for one use. Use in the morning and at night.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproduct
